create table tb_artista ( id_artista bigint generated by default as identity, ds_cpf varchar(255) not null, ds_genero varchar(255) not null, ds_nome varchar(255) not null, ds_nome_artistico varchar(255) not null, ds_sobrenome varchar(255) not null, primary key (id_artista) ) Hibernate:
create table tb_ingresso ( id_ingresso bigint generated by default as identity, ds_preco float(53) not null, ds_status varbinary(255) not null, ds_tipo varbinary(255) not null, primary key (id_ingresso) ) Hibernate:
create table tb_lote_ingresso ( id_lote bigint generated by default as identity, ds_desconto float(53) not null, primary key (id_lote) ) Hibernate:
create table tb_lote_ingresso_ingressos ( lote_id_lote bigint not null, ingressos_id_ingresso bigint not null ) Hibernate:
create table tb_show ( id_show bigint generated by default as identity, ds_cache integer not null, ds_data_especial boolean not null, ds_data timestamp(6) not null, ds_total_despesas integer not null, ds_artista bigint, primary key (id_show) ) Hibernate:
create table tb_show_lote ( show_id_show bigint not null, lote_id_lote bigint not null ) Hibernate:
